name: Galaxy Defense Plus: Classic defense game

description:
Galaxy Defense Plus - The best STRATEGY/ARCADE and ORIGINAL game!
----------------------------------------------------------------

You may have played many of Classic Defense games but Galaxy Defense, with tons of different challenging maps, each with its own unique setting ready to test your skill, this must be the best one you ever have. Galaxy Defense has classic defense design but whole new missions.
Galaxy Defense is a 100% free tactical game.

### FEATURES
+ 21 missions
+ 18 towers
+ 16 enemy units
+ Diversity of maps, never get bored.

### TIPS
+ Consider carefully where to place you defensive units
+ Prepare carefully strategy for the first waves coming
+ Never forget to upgrade your defense system
Enjoy and have fun!

Keep in touch with us: www.fb.com/TDefense

Let's play & get experience!
